title: Analysis of Post-Pandemic Math Learning Challenges and Solution Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing Student Engagement through Personal Device Utilization (BYOD) and Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five factors contributing to math learning disabilities in the post-pandemic era
Learners can evaluate peer learners' motivation decline cases using phenomenological research methods
Learners can propose adaptive instructional design strategies to enhance mathematical concept comprehension
Learners can develop two or more effective motivation tools (such as gamification) in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
